body.name: Best Choice Products 7-Piece Glass Dining Set, Modern Kitchen Table Furniture for Dining Room, Dinette, Compact Space-Saving w/Glass Tabletop, 6 Upholstered PU Chairs, Metal Steel Frame - Black

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Best Choice Products Store

features: SEATING FOR SIX: Arrange six soft cushioned chairs around the 51-inch table to create the perfect venue for family meals. When the fun is done, slide the chairs under the table to save space.
GLASS TABLETOP: This modern and sophisticated set includes a table with a glass top for an elegant touch which adds depth to a room while providing ample space for food and drinks
DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Each chair comes with padded PU leather and a curved backrest to help keep you comfortable as you dine, while sturdy powder-coated steel frames provide lasting quality
EASY MAINTENANCE: In case of spills, the water-resistant glass tabletop allows for the easiest cleanup possible; simply wipe away the mess and be done in seconds!

HIGH WEIGHT CAPACITY: The table holds up to 80 pounds while each chair comfortably supports up to 250 pounds to create a reliable addition to any kitchen, dining room, or breakfast nook; TABLE DIMENSIONS: 51.25"(L) x 27.5"(W) x 29.25"(H); CHAIR DIMENSIONS: 16"(L) x 16"(W) x 38"(H); TABLE WEIGHT CAPACITY: 80 lbs.; CHAIR WEIGHT CAPACITY: 250 lbs.; Items contained in 2 separate boxes. Transportation times may vary per box.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 4,122 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #17,167 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #2 in Kitchen & Dining Room Sets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Table
reviews.reviewText: This table and the customer service for the company are worthy of 5 stars. The table and chairs are shipped in two shipments (for the 2-seat table), and I was a little surprised when I received only the table. There was a paper inside the box explaining that it would be shipped in more than one, so that quelled my surprise a little. When I opened the package, I noticed some rust spots on the metal frame. By this point I was a little frustrated.By now you might be thinking why I gave it 5 stars. I contacted customer support, and they responded within a couple of days to clean the spots. I did that with some soft scrub cleaner, and they came right off. The second package arrived, and I was ready to install it. I have to say that it is a very cute and practical table for a small space. I was specifically looking for a white table, which is kind of difficult, but this one looked nice and was priced right. I like that the glass has a blue frost that went well with my décor.There were some surprises at the beginning, but with the responsiveness of customer support, the overall look of the table, and the price, I give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The dining set was very easy to assemble. Looks very charming in my den/dining area. I purchased this set to occupy an empty space in my den. Follow the instructions given and you will not go wrong. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality and Easy Assembly
reviews.reviewText: The table is super easy to put together. The only difficult part is placing the glass on top, which requires 2 people. The chairs are decently comfortable but nothing crazy. You will get the chairs in a different package, and for us it was on a different day. The only thing I did not love was some parts came with some reddish dust on them (almost like rust). Most of it came off with a cleaning wipe. Overall I think it is a good bang for your buck! It’s perfect for a small apartment. It is modern and chic. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This table is exactly what I was looking
reviews.reviewText: This table came in two boxes, the same day, put it together the next day no problems with any hardware with any indentations very sturdy very cute for the price. I could throw out and buy a new one every four months for that. It looks perfect, as a slight touch of class to my small space rental.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very elegant and modern looking. The table is sturdy and I love the soft surface of the seats. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's alright. Will upgrade in the future
reviews.reviewText: I moved into a new place and purchased this set since I needed tables and chairs.I've used this for a couple months already. The table is still fine as of now. But the chairs, their legs are bending. I do not see this as a long term table/chair set. The chair legs are not stable and good durability enough to withstand longterm use. Mind you, I am a skinny asian girl, so no way I am heavy enough to bend the chairs.I will upgrade to a better table and chairs set in the future. But for now, I'll keep using this as I've already purchased it and don't eat to throw away and waste it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Phenomenal Addition
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this table. It is clean, modern, simple, and sophisticated. Easy to put together and the quality is A-1! The chairs are so comfortable. If I went to a furniture store it would be $500.00 and I would have to wait 3 to 6 weeks. Amazon did the thing with one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chairs are rubbish. Table is good.
reviews.reviewText: The chairs are junk and probably will exit your life long before the table does. Having said that, the table is really good and overall I think it's a good buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good deal and ok quality for the price it’s worth it.
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good product dir the price. Arrived with minor scratches on chair frames but overall quality is ok. For short term investment in general purpose kitchen table and chairs I would recommend this product. For single or couple without kids. Won’t last long if kids are using.
